description: Number of different products (including the empty product) of any subset of {1, 2, 3, ..., n}.
comments: a(n) <= 2*a(n-1), with equality iff n is prime or n = 4. - _Martin Fuller_, Jun 03 2006
mathematica: (* Script not convenient for n > 24 *) a[n_] := Times @@@ Subsets[Range[n]] // Union // Length; Table[Print["a(", n, ") = ", an = a[n]]; an, {n, 1, 24}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Feb 02 2015 *)
author: _Jonas Wallgren_, May 10 2001
